title: What is the current ranking of NITs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I qualified Mains this year and have gone through cutoff of almost all NITs. Based on cuttoff (choice of students) NITs can be ranked as follows: 1.NIT trichy 2.NIT Surathkal and NIT Warangal(both have almost same cuttoff for all courses but the competition is very low in homestate quota,for same course rank difference between homestate candidate and other state candidate is very large ) 3.NIT Allahabad (here the competition is more in Homestate quota then in other state quota) 4).NIT Rourkela (competition is good in top 5 courses) 5)MNIT Jaipur (here also competition is more in Homestate quota then in other state quota) 6).NIT Calicut and SVNIT Surat and VNIT Nagpur 7).MANIT Bohpal 8).NIT Jamshedpur and NIT Durgapur and NIT Krukshetra 9).NIT Jalandar 10).NIT Hamirpur 11).NIT Silchar and NIT Patna and NIT Delhi 12).NIT Puducherry and NIT Uttrakhand and NIT Andhra Pradesh and NIT Goa and NIT Raipur 13).NIT Agartala 14).NIT Srinagar (It was good earlier but I don’t know why it cuttoff are increasing drastically from last 2 years) 15).NIT Arunachal Pradesh and NIT Sikkim and NIT Meghalaya and NIT Mizoram and NIT Nagaland NIT Manipur I have made this ranklist ,only considering the cuttoff of NITs for other state general candidate and nothing else.

There are two types of rankings one is NIRF ranking and the other is placementwise ranking. Coming to NIRF rankings 1 National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli 2 National Institute of Technology Rourkela 3 National Institute of Technology Karnataka 4 National Institute of Technology Warangal 5 National Institute of Technology Calicut 6 National Institute of Technology Kurukshetra 7 Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology 8 National Institute of Technology Durgapur 9 National Institute of Technology Silchar 10 Malviya National Institute of Technology 11 Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology 12 National Institute of Technology Hamirpur 13 Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology 14 National Institute of Industrial Engineering 15 National Institute of Technology Meghalaya 16 National Institute of Technology Agartala 17 National Institute of Technology Raipur 18 National Institute of Technology Goa 19 National Institute of Technology Jamshedpur 20 National Institute of Technology Patna There are some other NITS like NIT Ap and NIT jalandhar( my NIT :( ) whose rank is greater than 20. So that is the reason I have not menctioned them.
